variant.p: In developing recognition and measurement requirements for an entity’s opening IFRS balance sheet, the Board referred to the objective of financial statements, as set out in the Framework for the Preparation and Presentation of Financial Statements. The Framework states that the objective of financial statements is to provide information about the financial position, performance and changes in financial position of an entity that is useful to a wide range of users in making economic decisions.
